text: pinnit sulaimann nam maranam vidhiccu. appeal arum a maranam jinnukale ariyiccilla. addehattinre unnuvati tinnukeantirunna citalukalealike. annane sulaiman nilam paticcappeal jinnukalkk beadhyamayi; tannalkk abhetika karyannal ariyumayirunnenkil apamanakaramaya i duravasthayil kalinnukutentivarillayirunnuvenn
